headline: Why Lockheed Martin Fell on a Good Day for the Markets
summary: Iran indicated to mediators it's looking to end hostilities with Israel this morning.  Defense, oil, and gold stocks gave up some of last week's gains.  Shares of U.S. defense contractor Lockheed Martin (NYSE: LMT) fell 4% on Monday, even as the S&P 500 (SNPINDEX: ^GSPC) was up a strong 0.94% on the day.

headline: U.S.-China Rare Earths Deal May Omit Lockheed Martin's F-35; MP Materials Surges
summary: The U.S.-China trade framework reportedly didn't end a rare-earth export ban for military needs like the Lockheed Martin F-35. MP Materials soared.
